::: {.lead}
  We are an [interdisciplinary]{.fw-bolder} research group based within the [Faculty of Biochemistry and Molecular Medicine](https://www.oulu.fi/en/faculties-units/faculty-biochemistry-and-molecular-medicine){.text-primary .text-decoration-none .fw-bolder} at the [University of Oulu](https://www.oulu.fi/en){.text-primary .text-decoration-none .fw-bolder}. We develop [algorithms and tools]{.fw-bolder} for studying molecular networks with a focus on [the extracellular matrix]{.fw-bolder} in health and disease, perform [integrative analyses]{.fw-bolder} of the tumor microenvironment, and provide [bioinformatics services]{.fw-bolder}.
:::
